metadata.title: President felicitates Pak Team on winning 1st test against Windies

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 19 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari on Sunday congratulated the national cricket team on winning the first test match against West Indies in Multan. The president appreciated the excellent performance of the national team and expressed the hope that such a display of brilliance would continue in future, President Secretariat Press Wing said in a press release. He also expressed his good wishes for the future ventures of the Green Shirts. Pakistan leads the two-test series with 1-0 after winning the 1st test with 127 runs.
